data.title: Sports Medicine
data.meta_description: Duke's sports medicine specialists are internationally recognized for the treatment and rehabilitation of sports injuries.
data.text:
History of Success

Our sports medicine program has benefited patients with sports injuries for more than seven decades. We have been the training ground for hundreds of sports medicine doctors around the country.

Sports Injuries that Affect the Female Athlete

Sports injuries can affect women differently than men. Preventing sports injuries is our goal, and knowing how gender impacts the body is our specialty. We diagnose and treat female-specific injuries when they occur. Thatâ€™s important, whether you are a college-scholarship prospect, an Olympic hopeful, or a senior resuming a walking program after a fracture.
